mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_info (post_media, post_name, post_detail, uid) VALUES (#{post_media},#{post_name},#{post_detail},#{uid});
mapper.select: SELECT post_id, post_name, post_media, post_detail, post_rls_time, post_rp_num, post_info.uid, post_likes, uname FROM post_info INNER JOIN user_info ON post_info.uid = user_info.uid ORDER BY post_rls_time LIMIT 30;

SELECT pi.post_id, pi.post_name, pi.post_likes, pi.post_media, pi.post_detail, pi.post_rls_time FROM user_shared us INNER JOIN post_info pi on us.post_id = pi.post_id WHERE us.uid = #{uid} ORDER BY post_rls_time;
SELECT pi.post_id, pi.post_name, pi.post_likes, pi.post_media, pi.post_detail, pi.post_rls_time FROM user_like ul INNER JOIN post_info pi on ul.post_id = pi.post_id WHERE ul.uid = #{uid};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM user_like WHERE post_id = #{post_id} AND uid = #{uid};
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_like WHERE post_id = #{post_id} AND uid = #{uid}
